city.name: San Francisco
city.description: A vibrant city known for its iconic landmarks, hilly terrain, and diverse cultural attractions.

activity.name: Golden Gate Bridge
activity.description: Iconic suspension bridge connecting San Francisco Bay and the Pacific Ocean, offering stunning views and scenic walks.

activity.name: Alcatraz Island
activity.description: Former federal prison known for housing notorious criminals, now a popular tourist attraction offering tours of its historic facilities.

activity.name: The Slanted Door
activity.description: Acclaimed modern Vietnamese cuisine served in an elegant setting overlooking San Francisco Bay at the Ferry Building.

activity.name: San Francisco Museum of Modern Art (SFMOMA)
activity.description: Modern and contemporary art museum showcasing a diverse collection of paintings, sculptures, and multimedia installations.

activity.name: Coit Tower
activity.description: Historic tower in the Telegraph Hill neighborhood offering panoramic views of San Francisco.

activity.name: Golden Gate Park
activity.description: Large urban park featuring gardens, museums, lakes, and recreational facilities.

activity.name: Tartine Bakery
activity.description: Renowned bakery offering artisanal bread, pastries, and sandwiches in a cozy, casual setting.

activity.name: Exploratorium
activity.description: Interactive science museum offering hands-on exhibits and educational programs for all ages.

activity.name: Orpheum Theatre
activity.description: Historic theater in downtown San Francisco hosting Broadway shows, concerts, and other performances.

activity.name: Lombard Street
activity.description: Famous winding road known for its eight sharp turns in one block, lined with beautiful flowers and houses.

activity.name: Presidio of San Francisco
activity.description: Historic park offering hiking trails, scenic overlooks, and museums, with views of the Golden Gate Bridge.
